message: Post your device and maybe Android Version for a list of devices that convorsation is running on w/o problems.

htc desire 2.2

+1 for htc incredible, android 2.2

Samsung Epic 4G (Galaxy S) on Android 2.2.1
Anyone got it working on 2.1 yet? From the list I can't seem to see one, right? Maybe time to root my phone - is the app worth it?

@skohler i use a few things not available in 2.1. at this time you need droid>2.2 to run the app. but i'll see if i can bring that down to 2.1

i might be slightly biased whether the app is worth rooting your phone ;)
@EisFrei Fair point. Don't put too much into 2.1 - most devices should be on 2.2 anyways. Thx for considering though.
There's actually a fair amount of people still using 2.1: http://developer.android.com/resources/dashboard/platform-versions.html

FYI refuses to install on 2.1 (stock, rooted) on HTC Hero 200 (Sprint): "There is a problem parsing the package".  Yes, I have enabled non-Market installs and perform these all the time.  Never seen this particular error msg before...Googled and followed advice, still nothing...anyone?
you currently need at least 2.2 to run it
So I gather from this thread, but 2.2 is less than 9 months old, so 2.1 can hardly be considered "legacy".  Anyway, keep up the good work.
